content:
Hi Ian

Thanks for your suggestion which a number of users have put forward.

The best way to promote the idea is to raise and up-vote them on Mozilla Connect. The Thunderbird team take these ideas into consideration when setting priorities and planning road maps.

You can find your specific idea suggested below by other users for up-voting.

https://connect.mozilla.org/t5/ideas/option-to-send-pictures-reduced/idi-p/101513 https://connect.mozilla.org/t5/ideas/image-resize-is-needed-in-thunderbird-for-android/idi-p/77024
creator: platform34

content: Thunderbird does not supply an address book. If you want to see this capability post at https://connect.mozilla.org/t5/ideas/idb-p/ideas/label-name/thunderbird%20android (I believe this request already exists there) where you can also vote on other ideas.
creator: wsmwk

content:
Hi Teefers

Thunderbird for Android doesn't have a calendar feature.

It's a popular request so maybe the Thunderbird team will add this in the future.

Please consider up-voting the idea on Mozilla Connect. The Thunderbird team take these ideas into consideration when reviewing their priorities and road maps.

https://connect.mozilla.org/t5/ideas/calendar-support-on-thunderbird-mobile/idi-p/76394

In the meantime, Google calendar or one of the alternative open source apps such as Etar should provide the functionality you need.
creator: platform34
